column1: Uchi////Best Japanese food I had in Houston.  Not your everyday sushi or roll place.  Yes it is expensive but you get what you paid for.  We had 21 dishes between the 4 of us and they were all great.  Highly recommend to do the Signature Selection if you haven't been there and just add some more to share.  A few dishes that really stood out in my mind were the Walu Walu
column3: uni and geoduck.  The service was very good
column4: all the staff are very knowledgeable and explain each dish to us.  Will save up some money to go again.
